com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

Class MoveTextBeforeAfterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.AbstractRuleFactory
      • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.MoveTextBeforeAfterFactory

  • public class MoveTextBeforeAfterFactory
extends AbstractRuleFactory

    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to move a text

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

      • getRule

        public static Rule getRule(java.lang.String textToMove,
                           int position,
                           java.lang.String textToSearch,
                           boolean regex,
                           boolean matchCase)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method based on the parameters values return the right rule
        Parameters:
        textToMove - - text to move
        position - - this sets where to insert text; use MoveTextBeforeAfterFactory static fields to set this
        textToSearch - - text/regex near which insert text
        regex - - this flag indicates if textToSearch and textToMove are regular expression or literal patterns
        matchCase - - if true textToSearch is case sensitive; used only if regex is false
        Returns:
        the right rule, based on input parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if textToSearch or textToMove are null or empty, or if position value is invalid
